techDescriptions.React: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces with a component-based architecture.
techDescriptions.Node.js: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine for building scalable network applications.
techDescriptions.PostgreSQL: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open-source object-relational database system with a strong reputation.
techDescriptions.MongoDB: MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database program, using JSON-like documents.
techDescriptions.Figma: Figma is a cloud-based design tool for collaborative interface design, prototyping, and design systems.
techDescriptions.Bootstrap: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development.
techDescriptions.WordPress: WordPress is a free and open-source content management system written in PHP and paired with a MySQL database.
techDescriptions.Postman: Postman is an API platform for building and using APIs. It simplifies API development workflow.
techDescriptions.WooCommerce: WooCommerce is an open-source e-commerce plugin for WordPress, designed for online merchants.
techDescriptions.Shopify: Shopify is an e-commerce platform for online stores and retail point-of-sale systems.
techDescriptions.Material UI: Material UI is a popular React UI framework that implements Google's Material Design.

whoWeHelp.title: Who We Help
whoWeHelp.subtitle: A Trusted Partner for Growing Teams
whoWeHelp.description: We work with agencies, startups, and businesses of all sizes — supporting their teams and projects. We specialize in design, development, and everything in between that matters most.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: We build AI-powered web and mobile apps with innovative design and scalable development. Our team delivers seamless UI/UX and solutions to help your business grow smarter and faster.

serviceContent.title: E-commerce
serviceContent.description: We design and develop high-performing e-commerce platforms tailored to your business's needs. Whether it's checkout, we build seamless, scalable, and conversion-focused experiences that drive sales and customer loyalty.

testimonialsRow1.quote: Working with their team was a game-changer. They translated our product vision into a seamless web app with AI-powered features that impressed our investor.

testimonialsRow1.quote: They've become an extension of our team. From design to delivery, their process is smooth, and their quality is consistently top-notch. We trust them with every sprint.

developmentType.title: Front-End Development
developmentType.description: Fast, responsive, and pixel-perfect user interfaces.
developmentType.heading: Build modern, responsive interfaces that users love.
developmentType.content: Our front-end developers bring designs to life using clean, optimized code. We specialize in React.js, HTML/CSS, and ensure all designs are fluid and responsive for your business.

developmentType.title: Back-End Development
developmentType.heading: Scalable, secure, and efficient backend solutions.
developmentType.content: Our back-end experts create robust, secure, and high-performance server-side applications that power your digital products. We build scalable architecture that grows with your business.

developmentType.title: Full-Stack Development
developmentType.description: End-to-end development for fully integrated web apps.
developmentType.heading: End-to-end solutions for complex web applications.
developmentType.content: Our full-stack developers handle every aspect of your project—from user interfaces to server logic to database management. Get a cohesive solution with seamless integration across all layers.
offerings: Seamless data flow between front and back-end

developmentType.title: WordPress & CMS
developmentType.description: Custom WordPress sites with Elementor, and more.
developmentType.heading: Custom WordPress solutions for content-driven websites.
developmentType.content: We build customized WordPress websites that go beyond templates. From custom plugins to e-commerce solutions, our WordPress experts create optimized, secure, and user-friendly CMS experiences.
